text: @jay_venturaaaa I'm referring to men who freak out over commercials. Not actual real emotional turmoil. Very different.

@jay_venturaaaa toxic masculinity does that, exactly. We need to change the world so men feel safe to gave a healthy understanding of their emotions, so they can get help when they need it, so boys can grow up liking baseball and ballet without being bullied.

That was half of the entire message of the damn commercial.
@johnalvarado1 they aren't my cup of tea honestly. I'm just enjoying mocking overly sensitive types. I use an epillator, so I rarely need to shave anyway 🤷‍♀️
I’ll still keep shaving with Gillette. Their razors are pretty dang good and the gel is soothing.
